20110128023920.000|20110128023922.000|CC1|34 PEOPLE WERE INDICTED AND 20

20110128023924.000|20110128023926.000|CC1|THEY WERE ARRESTED FOR SOMETHING
20110128023926.000|20110128023927.000|CC1|THAT SOUNDS WAY CUTER THAN IT   
20110128023927.000|20110128023928.000|CC1|IS.                             
20110128023928.000|20110128023930.000|CC1|THEY WERE ARRESTED FOR STRAW MAN
20110128023930.000|20110128023931.000|CC1|PURCHASES.

20110128023932.000|20110128023933.000|CC1|SAY YOU'RE BUYING SOMETHING FOR 
20110128023933.000|20110128023934.000|CC1|YOURSELF BUT YOU'RE NOT.

20110128023936.000|20110128023938.000|CC1|MEN SAID THEY WERE BUYING AK-47s

20110128024243.000|20110128024244.000|CC1|>> YEAH.                        
20110128024244.000|20110128024244.000|CC1|IT IS.                          
20110128024244.000|20110128024245.000|CC1|AND THIS IS A CLASSIC CASE OF   
20110128024245.000|20110128024248.000|CC1|HOW THE LAW DOESN'T KEEP UP WITH
20110128024248.000|20110128024249.000|CC1|WHAT'S HAPPENING IN THE REAL    
20110128024249.000|20110128024249.000|CC1|WORLD.                          
20110128024249.000|20110128024251.000|CC1|WHEN THE LAW WAS PASSED, THIS   
20110128024251.000|20110128024253.000|CC1|GROWS OUT OF THE 1968 GUN       
20110128024253.000|20110128024254.000|CC1|CONTROL ACT, CONGRESS PERCEIVED 
20110128024254.000|20110128024257.000|CC1|THE PROBLEM TO BE HANDGUNS, EASY
20110128024257.000|20110128024259.000|CC1|TO CONCEAL HANDGUNS THAT CAN BE 
20110128024259.000|20110128024300.000|CC1|USED IN STREET CRIME.

20110128024303.000|20110128024305.000|CC1|THAT NEEDED TO COME UNDER THIS

20110128024307.000|20110128024309.000|CC1|BUT WHAT'S HAPPENED SINCE THEN  
20110128024309.000|20110128024310.000|CC1|IS THE MARKET HAS BEEN FLOODED  
20110128024310.000|20110128024314.000|CC1|BY FOREIGN IMPORTS AND AMERICAN 
20110128024314.000|20110128024316.000|CC1|MANUFACTURERS WITH THESE

20110128024319.000|20110128024322.000|CC1|THE WEAPONS OF CHOICE FOR DRUG  
20110128024322.000|20110128024323.000|CC1|CARTELS AND OTHER CRIMINAL      
20110128024323.000|20110128024324.000|CC1|TRAFFICKING ORGANIZATIONS AROUND
20110128024324.000|20110128024325.000|CC1|THE WORLD.

20110128024327.000|20110128024330.000|CC1|DRAMATIC AN EXAMPLE AS I'VE SEEN
20110128024330.000|20110128024331.000|CC1|OF HOW THIS WORKS.              
20110128024331.000|20110128024333.000|CC1|I MEAN, THIS ONE DRUG -- GUN    
20110128024333.000|20110128024335.000|CC1|STORE YOU THAT MENTIONED,       
20110128024335.000|20110128024336.000|CC1|FEDERALLY LICENSED FIREARM      
20110128024336.000|20110128024338.000|CC1|DEALER, LONE WOLF, I COUNTED    
20110128024338.000|20110128024342.000|CC1|SOMETHING LIKE 600 ASSAULT

20110128024346.000|20110128024348.000|CC1|STRAW PURCHASERS AT THIS ONE

20110128024405.000|20110128024407.000|CC1|MEXICO ARE GOING SHOPPING FOR

20110128024409.000|20110128024410.000|CC1|>> WELL, WHY HAS THE PROPOSED   
20110128024410.000|20110128024412.000|CC1|RULE CHANGE ON THIS, THE SORT OF

20110128024418.000|20110128024420.000|CC1|LEAST FOR THESE BORDER STATES?  
20110128024420.000|20110128024422.000|CC1|>> WELL, THIS IS THE POLITICS OF
20110128024422.000|20110128024425.000|CC1|ANYTHING TO DO WITH GUNS.

20110128024427.000|20110128024428.000|CC1|PROPOSED RULE WAS ANNOUNCED BY  
20110128024428.000|20110128024429.000|CC1|KENNETH NELSON, THE ACTING      
20110128024429.000|20110128024431.000|CC1|DIRECTOR OF THE BUREAU OF       
20110128024431.000|20110128024432.000|CC1|ALCOHOL, TOBACCO AND FIREARMS IS

20110128025555.000|20110128025558.000|CC1|   ? EVERYBODY, SING IT NOW ?   
20110128025558.000|20110128025558.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110128025558.000|20110128025559.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110128025559.000|20110128025601.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110128025601.000|20110128025601.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110128025601.000|20110128025605.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110128025605.000|20110128025605.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110128025605.000|20110128025607.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110128025607.000|20110128025609.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110128025609.000|20110128025611.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110128025611.000|20110128025611.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110128025611.000|20110128025613.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110128025613.000|20110128025613.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110128025613.000|20110128025615.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110128025615.000|20110128025615.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110128025615.000|20110128025617.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110128025617.000|20110128025619.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110128025619.000|20110128025619.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110128025619.000|20110128025621.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110128025621.000|20110128025621.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110128025621.000|20110128025623.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110128025623.000|20110128025623.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110128025623.000|20110128025626.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110128025626.000|20110128025626.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110128025626.000|20110128025629.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110128025629.000|20110128025629.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110128025629.000|20110128025630.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110128025630.000|20110128025630.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110128025630.000|20110128025632.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110128025632.000|20110128025634.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110128025634.000|20110128025634.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110128025634.000|20110128025636.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110128025636.000|20110128025636.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110128025636.000|20110128025638.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110128025638.000|20110128025639.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110128025639.000|20110128025639.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110128025639.000|20110128025641.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110128025641.000|20110128025641.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110128025641.000|20110128025644.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110128025644.000|20110128025644.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110128025644.000|20110128025646.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110128025646.000|20110128025647.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110128025647.000|20110128025647.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110128025647.000|20110128025650.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110128025650.000|20110128025650.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110128025650.000|20110128025652.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110128025652.000|20110128025652.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110128025652.000|20110128025654.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110128025654.000|20110128025654.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110128025654.000|20110128025656.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110128025656.000|20110128025656.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110128025656.000|20110128025658.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110128025658.000|20110128025658.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110128025658.000|20110128025701.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110128025701.000|20110128025702.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110128025702.000|20110128025704.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110128025704.000|20110128025704.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110128025704.000|20110128025706.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20110128025706.000|20110128025706.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20110128025706.000|20110128025709.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20110128025709.000|20110128025709.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious
